cart.name: Milk
cart.description: Fresh milk, perfect for adding to coffee. Its light texture and neutral taste make it a versatile choice for various milk-based beverages.

cart.name: Arabica Whole Beans
cart.description: Premium Arabica coffee beans with a rich, smooth flavor and a slight acidity. Perfect for espresso or filter coffee brewing.

cart.name: Ground Arabica Coffee
cart.description: Robusta beans offer a strong and intense flavor with a pronounced bitterness. Ideal for those who prefer bold morning coffee or milk-based drinks.
